Deferred_Cost_Schedule_Data.description: Reference element representing the Deferred Cost Schedule frequency.
From date. The system generates installments based on this value.
To date. The system generates installments based on this value.

validation.validation: Enter a date range that's less than 100 years for the From Date and To Date.

Deferred_Cost_Schedule_Data.description: Number of installments. The system generates installments based on this value.

validation.validation: Enter a number that's less than 1,200 for the Number of Installments.

validation.validation: Only one worktag of each type is allowed
[list of worktag types] not valid for this transaction.

Deferred_Cost_Installment_Data.description: Element Container for Deferred Cost Installment Line Data

validation.validation: Installment Line Amount must not equal to 0.
Invalid Deferred Cost Transaction for the Installment Line.

Deferred_Cost_Schedule_Data.description: Element Container for Deferred Cost Installment Data

validation.validation: To Date must be greater than From Date.
You may not update installments with status Canceled, Completed, or In Progress.
There must be at least one Installment Line.

description: Element Container for Deferred Cost Schedule Data

validation.validation: Please set the Amortization Method to Custom if you are adding or updating installments.
Please add only valid Deferred Cost Transactions to the schedule based on the Company, Currency and Customer.
